name: Cocoon Dressmaker
desc: When entering the "Butterfly Soul" state, inflict "Cocoon" to all enemy targets. They cannot take action in the next turn, are action delayed by 50% at the start of the turn, and take Physical DMG equal to 5000% base DMG. While allies are in the "Butterfly Soul" state, enemy targets will become afflicted with "Cocoon" again every 2 turn(s), and "Butterfly Soul" recovers 4 attack count(s) after the first time enemy targets become Weakness Broken.
